content: the story of winnie the pooh and the honey tree has always been a favourite of our family when the children were little who could not relate to the adorable bear s love of sweet honeycomb dripping with golden goodness this is the inspiration behind this sweet pattern this is a top cuff down sock the pattern is written for sizes small medium and large 58 66 and 74 stitches circumference yarn and notions yarn 100g fingering weight sample in smooth sock by alley cat yarns colourway lily alley cat yarns website https //alleycatyarns ca/collections/smooth-sock needles 2 25 mm on long cable for magic loop technique or dpns if preferred gauge 9 sts = 1 inch in stockinette stitch notions stitch markers needle for grafting and scissors extra options included special instructions for shortie socks are in blue other options for cuff and heel flap are in purple helpful videos on how to do the right and left twist stitches are available on my instagram main grid and under the hunny tree socks tab @marieelysedugal on ig
